favourite.article: Amazing song
Lord I desire to be filled with You. Amen Lord I love You.
Isn't this the melody for "Once I had a Secret love"?

Today during the Bible study I really enjoyed that we need to give Him our first love daily! Lord Jesus, I still love You. Save me from my own "working" for You; instead, I want to "labor" in You and with You! Labor is doing things for The Lord out of love! If we love The Lord Jesus, we won't have to try to do things for Him out of duty. We will love Him so much we will just labor for Him out of love!
Jesus is our first love.

Oh Lord, we’ve been drawn off by many things. But now we turn our heart back—how it sings! We repent of loving other things—Jesus, Lord, You’re our first, best, and everlasting love! Fill us with Your sweet, eternal rest! Lord Jesus we love you!
P.S. Never lose your first love ♡ (Romans 2:1-7)
Lord I love You.
Lord! Thank You for being our first love and the One we love the best! Keep us turning our heart to love You!
Jesus Lord, You are our FIRST LOVE!!!!

Amen! How we love God above anything else! Nothing can replace Him! We love Him even more each day! We can't compare Him to any other thing here on earth for He is so Great as our very God who is everything to us and our all and in all! Hallelujah! To love and enjoy Him fully is such the bountiful ways to feel His fragrance and preciousness! Let us boldly declare, "Lord Jesus, we love You and we are Yours alone! Constrain us more with Your love! Cause us to be the loving seekers of Yours today and forever!" Amen.
Praise the Lord! :)

Thank the Lord for such a reminding hymn! It is only the Lord that our hearts love the best. It's the Lord's person that has attracted us, not what He gives and does to us...May the Lord reveal more of Himself that our hearts would repent on loving things less than Him. Oh, Lord, You're our first love!
Lord we love You for Yourself! Not in what You give or do. Nothing else could ever compare with the joy of loving You! When we are loving You, we are filled with Your sweet rest.

Thank You God for loving me. Thank You Daddy for not leaving me when I left my first love for You. Please help me return to my first love. Help me Daddy please so I can teach transgressors Your way and my sinning brothers and sisters will be converted to You.
I really enjoyed the hymns. it reminds me to come closer to the Lord.
I felt that I should turn to the Lord everyday and I really appreciate this hymn a lot.
Jesus Lord, You're our first and best love! Thank You Lord we have been drawn off by many things, but we can always come back to You!
This song causes me to cherish the sweet One in my spirit!!!!!
I love this song because it helps me turn to the Lord. Especially when I am doing so many things, I just need to turn back to my first Love.
I verily like this song because it causes me to remember my first love in the Lord Jesus Christ and it is most lovable hymn I ever had heard since I was a believer

This song turns my heart to the Lord Jesus and away from all my troubles, cares and worries. It exalts Christ in my heart and lifts me far above all in this life. It restores my soul for Christ Himself opens the door for me to sup with Him.
